m_szDocSumamry: Former SunPower Executive Bruce Ledesma Is Now Mosaic’s COO Originally published in the ECOreport . Photo Courtesy Mosaic For the past 15 years, Bruce Ledesma has been working with either solar or financial services. As Executive Vice President and General Counsel of SunPower Corporation, he oversaw that company’s growth from $250 million to $2.5 billion in annual revenues. That was his greatest professional experience to date. Today, former SunPower VP Bruce Ledesma is now Mosaic’s COO.
